data.name: Slave Application
data.detailed_description:
----------
Do you know your true place in this galaxy? Are you meant to serve? Then apply to be a slave to a truly dominant and superior species!
---------

Role Playing - But are you really role playing when you are just being yourself?
Simulation - You may believe that this is but a simulation of what an extensive slave application process would be like.
Choice Matters - How would we ever be able to judge your suitability without your pathetic input?
Unique Battle System - To best simulate what it would really be like to have a slave, a mistress, and an automaton in battle.



Prospective slaves will have the chance to prove themselves throughout 7 chapters loaded with content in order to pass the application.

1. Stand at Attention: Learn about the process, learn how to succeed in the process and prove yourself. The first part of each chapter will cover the intricacies of the game and what you were able to learn.

2. Serve: Mistresses like servile slaves. You will be put into scenarios within which you will learn what pleases a Mistress. Put on the leash, so to speak.

3. Work: You will be given a specific task in which you shall be expected to excel in. You will wait on an Automaton, a fighting gladiator robot. Your choices will surely make battle rather interesting for your Mistress.

4. Worship: You will have some time to yourself... to worship Mistress Goddess inside your shrine room. Save up enough currency to purchase shopping trips for your mistress so that you can collect new photos to add to your shrine room and worship.

Prospective slaves will have the chance to prove themselves throughout 7 chapters loaded with content in order to pass the application.

data.short_description: Slave Application is a substantive, mature rogue-like roleplaying game that simulates (or does it) what it would be like to apply to be a slave to a truly superior species on a planet far away. The choices you make will determine whether or not you will succeed at impressing Mistress Goddess.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes depictions of sexual acts and/or extreme violence. Mature themes in the story depict violent and non-consensual sadistic acts of a sexual nature, drug and alcohol abuse, and self-harm.
